lyrics:
[Intro]
Ohh I like it
Ohh man I like it

[Verse 1]
I like it, I think I'm gonna like it
I like it, I think I'm gonna like it
I like it, I really really like it
I think I'm gonna buy cause I really, really like it

[Refrain](x2)
Sell me something


[Verse 2]
Ohh I like it, I really really like it
I like it, I really really like it
I like it, I think I'm gonna buy it
I think I'm gonna buy cause I really, really like it

[Verse 3]
Eternal Consumption Engine
Here in the USA
Eternal Consumption Engine
Sure do like to spend our pay
Eternal Consumption Engine
More make it more I'll buy
Eternal Consumption Engine
Slangin' out the slices of American Pie

[Verse 4]
Eternal Consumption Engine
Every time I get a little bit bored
Eternal Consumption Engine
Head to the Wally-Mart store
Eternal Consumption Engine
Livin' high on the greasy hog
Eternal Consumption Engine
As long as they don't deport my job
Eternal Consumption Engine
Cause Everything's is made in China
Eternal Consumption Engine
Everything nowadays is made in China

[Chorus](x4)
Eternal Consumption Engine

[Chorus](x4)

[Bridge]
(Everything's made in China)
Eternal Consumption Engine
(Everything's made in China)
Eternal Consumption Engine
(Everything's made in China)
Eternal Consumption Engine
(Everything's made in China)
Eternal Consumption Engine

[Outro]
Everything's made in China (x3)
Everything nowadays is made in China
